content.rendered: Jual kamera CCTV Hikvision dengan tersedia dengan type DVR DS-7324HUHI-K4 (Turbo HD 4.0) harga murah!! Kamera CCTV Hikvision DS-7324HUHI-K4 (Turbo HD 4.0) dapat membantu anda dalam menjaga aset di dalam bangunan ataupun luar bangunan. Hikvision DS-7324HUHI-K4 (Turbo HD 4.0) tipe kamera pengawas yang memiliki kelebihan : Video/Audio Input : Audio Input : 4-ch Video Compression : H.265 Pro+/H.265 Pro/H.265/H.264+/H.264 Analog and HD-TVI video input : 24-ch,BNC interface (1.0Vp-p, 75 ohm)connection Supported camera types : Support HDTVI input: 8 MP, 5 MP, 4 MP, 3 MP, 1080p25, 1080p30, 720p25, 720p30, 720p50, 720p60 ; Support AHD input: 5 MP, 4 MP, 1080p25, 1080p30, 720p25, 720p30 ; Support CVI input: 4 MP, 1080p25, 1080p30, 720p25, 720p30 ; support CVBS input Audio Compression : G.711u Audio Input Interface : 4-ch, RCA (2.0 Vp-p, 1 K ohm) Two-way Audio : 1-ch, RCA (2.0 Vp-p, 1 K ohm) (using audio input) Video/Audio Output : CVBS Output : 1-ch,BNC(1.0Vp-p,75 ohm),resolution:PAL:704×576,NTSC:704×480 HDMI2 Output : 1-ch,4K(3840 x 2160)/30Hz,2K(2560 x 1440)/60Hz,1920 x 1080/60Hz,1280 x 1024/60Hz,1280 x 720/60Hz, 1024 x 768/60Hz HDMI/VGA Output : 1920 x 1080 / 60 Hz,1280 x 1024 / 60 Hz, 1280 x 720 / 60 Hz, 1024 x 768 / 60 Hz Recording resolution : 8 MP/5 MP/4 MP/3 MP/1080p/720p/WD1/4CIF/VGA/CIF Video Bit Rate : 32 Kbps-6 Mbps Stream Type : Video/Video&Audio Two-way Audio : 1-ch, RCA (2.0 Vp-p, 1 k ohm) (using the audio input) Audio Output : 1-ch RCA(Linear, 1k ohm) Dual Stream : Support Playback Resolution : 8MP/5MP/4MP/3MP/1080p/720p/WD1/4CIF/VGA/CIF Synchronous Playback : 16-ch
